Project Description
The zevenseas Community Solution Release Workspace

Project that will contain solutions developed by the zevenseas team and made available freely to the community.

This currently includes:
  • zevenseas Show/Hide SharePoint 2010 Ribbon
  • zevenseas Search Admin Pages
  • zevenseas Notifier
  • zevenseas Themes
  • zevenseas LifeCycle Management
  • zevenseas FeatureBlocker
  • zevenseas CKS:EBE Theme Feature Builder
  • zevenseas Site Staple Feature Builder
  • zevenseas CKS:EBE Search Feature
  • zevenseas Community Solutions Library
  • zevenseas MOSS SQL SearchCoder
  • zevenseas Community Web Parts
    • Choice Filter Web Part - More Info
    • Quick Alert Web Part - More Info
    • AD ChangePassword Web Parts - More Info
    • QuickTask WebPart More Info


Other Free Solutions from zevenseas:
  • Tagged Links - Social Bookmarking for SharePoint - More Info
  • Link Conductor - Easy and managed URL redirection for SharePoint - More Info
  • Tags Web Parts - Tag Cloud and Tag list for SharePoint - More Info
  • ScreenScraper - Create a screenshot and save in that in a sharepoint list - More Info
